class.name: OScriptNodeChance
class.brief_description: Picks one of two outputs based on chance.
class.description: The [OScriptNodeChance] node calculates a value between [code]0[/code] and [code]100[/code] (inclusive). The node will exit the top output pin if the calculated value is between 0 and the top pin's value (inclusive); otherwise, the node will exit the bottom output pin. The node's chance breakpoint is set in the inspector.
